item.title: Nepal’s Gen Z Leads Mass Protests Against Social Media Ban in Kathmandu
item.description: Thousands of young Nepalis have poured onto the streets of Kathmandu after the government imposed a sweeping ban on 26 major social media platforms, including Facebook, YouTube, X and WhatsApp. What b
